content: this pattern was available from the crochet today website an archived link still exists of this version **from the description ** if you find patterns difficult to follow this easy project is for you we ve written it with no abbreviations making it simple to stitch tlc baby amore 5 oz/140g balls each approx 286yd/262m acrylic/nylon 2 balls #9522 orchid 1 ball #9832 light blue 1 ball #9001 white 1 ball #9256 yellow
